note: The ratio can exceed 100 percent due to over-aged and under-aged children who enter lower secondary school late/early and/or repeat grades.
title: Completion rate of lower-secondary education
subtitle: Ratio of the number of new entrants in the last grade of [lower-secondary](#dod:lower-secondary-education) education, regardless of age, and the total population of the theoretical entrance age to the last grade of lower-secondary education.
